website_summaries.verdict: It's a quick and effective treatment for most types of worms, but it won't do anything about whipworms.
pros: Works on tapeworms, ringworms and hookworms
Flavored chewables that only need to be taken once per month
Users report positive results in as little as 24 hours after treatment
cons: Cannot be used on puppies under 12 weeks

customer_reviews.title: This sh!t works!!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review products but my great Dane had worms really really bad so I looked at the reviews on this product and what it covered and it really seemed like it would possibly work so I said for the price I'll give it a try and if it doesn't work out I'll buy the more expensive product lo and behold I gave this to my dog both pills because he's a great day literally 24 to 48 hours later he was completely worm free this product is amazing and I will recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: solomonwise

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem getting our rescue Lab to eat these, worked as described. The directions could have been more clear as to how often to give for complete control. There is a multiple dose package available and it indicates to repeat dose after 2 weeks to insure complete removal of parasites. Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Brinda

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I forgot I even had to use these for my dog as they worked so well after the first dose we haven't had any other issues since. I'm assuming the flavor is good as my dog ate it without any issues. It was only a day later when she started acting better and showing signs of feeling better. Definitely a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Kobold

customer_reviews.title: Worked the first time!
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 puppies a month apart and already had an adult dog. All of them are English Mastiffs. This product has both ingredients to kill several different type of worms. It worked right away, as they pooped, the dead worms were coming out. I did re-worm them a month later , just because I wanted to be 100% sure. I am completely satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Pea :-)

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE FOR SENSITIVE STOMACHS
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Don't do it. My dog doesn't have worms (now I know) but he was scooting his butt and I wanted to make sure. I gave him 2 because he is 90-100 lbs. A couple hours later and he has the worst diarrhea I've ever saw. After he did it all over the floor and ruined the rug, he went outside to do it again and it was complete water. It was not worth it. My dog does have a sensitive stomach, but others have said their dog does too and did fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Young

customer_reviews.title: Worth the .money
customer_reviews.text: Did what it was supposed to the first time. Most meds have to be repeated and only get 2 or 3. This is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Coke

customer_reviews.title: Worked the first time
customer_reviews.text: We recently adopted a shelter dog. Lo and behold (even though we were told the opposite), he had worms in his poop. I ordered these tablets to give him quick relief. He's 50 lbs., so I was unsure if I should give him 1 tablet, or 2--his weight is right on the cusp. I went with 1 under the assumption that less medicine was better, and I could dose the dog again if I needed to. There was no need, however, as Charlie's worms were promptly resolved. My doggo is now happy, and I have another tablet to use if needed in the future :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: This did not work for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I liked that there was just a simple tablet for my dogs to take, i purchased this for my 2 bluetick hounds who are avid about being outdoors and in the woods. The tend to eat random things and i noticed some scooting going on not took long ago so i figured i better de-worm. This is the 1st time i have bought this brand, and due to all the great reviews i figured i would give it a shot. Sadly, it didnt work on either dog, so i can not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: RIPPED OFF AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: Both the listing and the packagesay it is good for dogs 25-200 lbs. But there is only enough in the package for the dosage recommended for a 100 lb dog. If the dosage for a 200 lb dog is four chewables how the hell are two chewables good enough for a 200 lb dog? ABSOLUTE PURE DECEPTION! ROBBED AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: BIG BRYAN'S BIG ADVENTURE

customer_reviews.title: Dewormer seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why this is asking me to rate the thickness and sheerness of a dewormer so I’m not responding to those questions. I have these to my greyhound who had been sick with diarrhea. She went to the vet and was diagnosed with a stomach and intestinal bug. After 2 rounds of flaygil she wasn’t better so I tried this dewormer. She started to act happier within a day or two. Her poops also started to firm up within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne D

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: My Bassett hound, who is an 80 pound tank ate this after having dinner and threw up the pills and his entire dinner within an hour. He has had worms before and many meds and never threw them up. Not only is this a complete waste of money now he's sick.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to our 45 pound beagle. He was lethargic and shivering. My daughter looked it up..he had the signs of an overdose! I blame it on the vast difference in weight. Yes, I gave the proper dose.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea how I should have administered this.
customer_reviews.text: I wish there had been some sort of instructions with this. Nothing on the box or the insert about how many of the 2-pack pills to administer or when. Single pill seems to have been effective, though; no worms in his poo now. Since he absolutely won’t stop eating other dogs’ waste, it’s probably good there were two pills in the package.
customer_reviews.author: JJ-J

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the job it does
customer_reviews.text: So let me first say I didn't know if this would work or not, my dog (puppy) has refused in the past to eat any kind of dewormer so I've had to hide previous ones in her food. We had NO problem getting her to eat these two pills (she's 65lbs). I'm not sure if she had worms or not because we keep her on a regular dewormer but I will definitely keep this particular one at the top of my list because she actually ate it with no problem, and based on previous reviews from others it works so I say try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Sajujama

customer_reviews.title: Worked within 4 hours
customer_reviews.text: This wormer worked amazingly fast. My dog weighs 60 lbs and gave him both tablets as recommended for 50 to 100 lb. He chewed them up like they were his favorite treat. I monitored him afterwards and approx 4 hours later he did his business containing many dead worms. He has more energy now and is back to normal. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi L.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommend to us from someone who has used it. Our dog loved the taste and we got results the day after we gave it to her. Worth the price. Our dog got her spark back the next day. We will use it again, if we need it.
customer_reviews.author: wolflover

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Lady
customer_reviews.text: My dog tends to get tapeworms from eating rabbit poop. So when she's scooting her bum across the grass I know it's time she gets one of these. Knocks them out quickly. Works great for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Worked like it should.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it treated my dogs worms so I'd say it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta Albert

customer_reviews.title: Worked for senior dog
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous because I was using this on my 18 year old terrier, but since I have given it to him I have not noticed any more worms so it seems to have done the job. I took away one star because it did give him pretty frequent loose stools for a day and a half, and he seemed to have more frequent poops for a few days so he had to be confined to the kitchen that has tile floors. Other than that I did not notice any other ill effects and he seems fine now.
customer_reviews.author: NikiJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my dog and 1 week later he went to vet and was free and clear of all worms... will def be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: My doggie died so I don't know if they worked fast shipping tho will buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Maria B Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my golden retriever who had symptoms of worms. I stuck it in chicken to give to the dog. The pills were rather large and there is no difference in her stool even 2 days later.
customer_reviews.author: Kima R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Three different trips to the vet for 3 different wormers, and this is the only one that finally killed them. Highly recommend, excellent product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Dog Rejected It
customer_reviews.text: My dog threw up this medicine and all the food in his stomach about 5 minutes after eating it. I went to my local pet store and bought a more expensive brand and he didn't throw it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money....
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely did NOT keep ticks off my dog. Waste of money....
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I tried several other dewormers and none worked like this one. I will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: PAWS

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what it said it would do and saved me an expensive trip to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Winter Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Yogi, is food-obsessed, he readily ate the tablets. I feel better knowing that any parasites are gone or at least dead. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product worked fast and well. My dog literally ate the tablets out of my hand without the use of treats. I've seen no more evidence of worms since she too this medicine. It go to my house fast and was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different dewormers and this has been the only one that actually works. Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Not For Picky Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog HATED this product. I tried everything to get her to eat it; cheese, peanut butter and even chicken, but she just spat it back out. If you have a clever dog that doesn’t like medicine, like I do, I do not recommend this tablet version of dewormer. I’m searching now for a powder; perhaps a chew.
customer_reviews.author: A.D. Page

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will love this chewable
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate it rite up there a favored chewable no fuss and she was just fine no side affects she’s a med. sized dog no hassle
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: It's dewormer alright.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this dewormer several times before and it works. The price was super right on this listing! I'm glad I came across it.
customer_reviews.author: Dai Masters

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as the title says. Pay attention to the weight doses. Large dogs? Not really
customer_reviews.author: robert cook

customer_reviews.title: Good and works
customer_reviews.text: I hate given poisoning to my dogs but at times they need to be treated for worms. The product is very good as treats many different types so really good the price. It as well seem to work well as well.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works very fast
customer_reviews.text: I found worm on my dogs poop when I adopted him. Next day there were not worm anymore. This thing works fast!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia R.

customer_reviews.title: no side effects had...
customer_reviews.text: product came as described. No complaints. I would buy again. No side effects
customer_reviews.author: Mr&Mrs.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had gotten worms from the dog park I believe. I used this product because I was unable to go into the vet to get something to get rid of them. I stopped seeing worms in her excrement within 2 days. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Sammisinger

customer_reviews.title: Good dog product.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well for my dogs and they both like them.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Stuck them in a piece of hotdog and ole Duke gobbled em down.
customer_reviews.author: Daren505

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing how my dog just ate these tablets, they look like ordinary tablets but I guess they don’t taste bad to my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: My dog had tape worms in her poop. Gave her two doses and nothing ever came out....
customer_reviews.author: Dillonac915

customer_reviews.title: No side effects and no disgusting feces loaded with worms
customer_reviews.text: My 90 lb. lab had a lingering problem with worms and nothing seemed to help. The Sentry treatment did the trick quickly. No side effects and no disgusting feces loaded with worms. They just disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: One tablet worked to get rid of the tapeworms in my dog within about 2 days, even though she weighs about 48 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: VegaTheDog

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: One pill did the trick. Eady to use and small enough to get dog to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: irvingtonguy

customer_reviews.title: Yucky worms
customer_reviews.text: Good for what it's for. Need to ask the dogs😂
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Took my dog to the vet 2 weeks after using this product and he still had worms. very expensive dog treat!
customer_reviews.author: Cary Pruett

customer_reviews.title: Great price and really works
customer_reviews.text: I have used much more expensive de-wormers for the dogs. I decided to try this and it was half the price and got the job done. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ReHab

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: One time and done. It is very Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cure
customer_reviews.text: Product work as it claimed. Dog loved the flavor. Great value compared to the pricing at the chain pet stores
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Wormer
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery --great packaging. Thanks. This is a great product..
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Works fast!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would have gotten here faster, but it worked overnight. The price was very affordable and I didn't need a prescription.
customer_reviews.author: Kenza

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in the hopes of something finally working, It did!!! Taz is feeling much better and so is his pet parent! Thanks Sentry for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: tammi faye

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY WILL purchase again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Both dogs were super good at taking these! Both of them showed no side affects or any issues after taking them! Seemed to work good! Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Karissa K

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. My dog had tape worms and it got rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Not given what i purchased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two large packages, each containing two tablets. I only received one of the packages.
customer_reviews.author: Adam rankin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is so so, hasn't worked that well on our Beagle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY BEFORE ANYTHING ELSE, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderful. The very next day my dog had no worms. Very happy we were.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H.

customer_reviews.title: Worms be gone..... sorta....
customer_reviews.text: I use nothing but Worm X to deworm my dog and it works. But, it isn't a cure it is just a treatment. After about 3 months the worms will return and you'll need to retreat your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. V

customer_reviews.title: Sentry Dog Dewormer
customer_reviews.text: This dewormer seems to do a good job, and it's less expensive than other brands. My dog will eat almost anything, but she wasn't sure at first if she wanted to eat these. A bit of cheese and all was well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Yep, totally worked in a very short amount of time. My senior chocolate lab had no side effects at all. Saved me a vet bill, although I will get her tested in 30 days to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great. I gave my 45 lb dog one "Large dog" pill and the worms were gone within a day. No noticeable side effects, would definitely use again in the future if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Safari Girl

customer_reviews.title: I just got it today. Was fast shipping. ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today. Was fast shipping. See how it works for my new rescue. I only wish there was larger pack maybe with lower cost since I have 4 rescues. Hard though with so many sized dogs and keeping up with all there needs.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Joosten

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked very well for our dogs. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. Easy to follow instructions and my dog loves them. I didn't even have to put it in her food. I will be reordering these chewies next time.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This item not only shipped on time but it worked wonderfully!!! My dogs are all de-wormed thanks to this product and I was really worried about one dog in particular and shes doing great! She has her "spunk" back!!! THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Sexy Phone Girls

customer_reviews.title: Save money
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Same thing you get at the pet store just for a lot less money. Did I say that it has a Great Price.
customer_reviews.author: Kehau

customer_reviews.title: Worked well.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well. He didn't want to eat it very badly... even after crushing it up and mixing it in scrambled eggs. He wouldn't eat it that night, but I left the eggs in his food bowl and he ate it all up the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of roundworms
customer_reviews.text: My puppy had roundworms, and I used this to treat her. Within three weeks her stool was looking healthy again. It's been a few months since then, and there has been no sign of worms.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyS

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on a timely manner to assist my pet; of which I now see a lot of improvement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: End Carpet Surfing Now!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to have done the trick as my dog is no longer carpet surfing! He didn't hesitate and happily munched down the tablet! Worth getting even if you just think your pooch might have worms!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben.G

customer_reviews.title: Sentry Dewormer
customer_reviews.text: I had recently purchased Safe-Guard Dewormer three times in the past year. It is much more expensive than Sentry and Safe-Guard did not work for me. After I reviewed the product, Safe-Guard made no attempt to contact me or to resolve the situation. It is my personal opinion that Sentry Dewormer is far superior to Safe-Guard. Try Sentry once and you'll probably never use any other Dewormer again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Karchalova

customer_reviews.title: Its so much easier than the liquid or powder. ...
customer_reviews.text: Its so much easier than the liquid or powder. I use to buy it at tractor supply until i found it on amazon it waa half the price i want be buying it anywhere else but here. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: recommended product
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that my two Golden Retriever (+50 pounds) had worms. I did some research and this product was the most complete and one of the cheapest ones so I decided to give it an opportunity. The problem is that I read "two pills" and assumed two doses, but both pills are for just one dog. Anyway, I gave one pill to each of them while re-ordering. To my great surprise, the product worked wonderfully anyway. My dogs were checked a bit later and it was confirmed that they had no worms. That's why I'm recommending Sentry.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Price  Hike,  not good
customer_reviews.text: Used be able to get the 12 pack for what the 2 pack goes for now. Still a good product, but what's up with the price Hike?
customer_reviews.author: Dawg Haus

customer_reviews.title: Bad rating is for the seller not the product
customer_reviews.text: Bad rating is for the seller not the product. I received the product two days ago and my dog had to he put to sleep unexpectedly today. I can't return the product without an alarmingly high price tag. Way to show some compassion.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: they send me the wrong medicine
customer_reviews.text: i buy two product of this one i pay 34 someting and they send me diferent stuff a blue box diferent name and when i check the other product i sen the price is 10dollar with cns well i dont care the money the things is i read pruct i buy because i want ma puppie ben out of worms tht nasty and they send me o wrong one and its dosen work i give to ma dog o box already and the hook worm till there soo i ddnt satisface with the product
customer_reviews.author: Slv

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved this. So it must have tasted great to them. Must work too because they have no worms.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Sentry HC 7 Way De-Wormer for Medium & Large Dogs, 2 Count
product_meta.description: SENTRY HC Worm X Plus broad spectrum wormer treats and controls 7 strains of worms: 2 tapeworms, 2 round worms and three hookworms. Comes in a easy and convenient chewable.
feature_bullets: Sentry HC WormX Plus Small Dog
Kills 7 Strains of Tapeworm, Hookworm and Ringworm
